messages.subject: Re: ADV Manga Acquires PMK
messages.msgSnippet: ... The ADV site didn t have any release info for it that I saw. *pout* I do know that the anime has things in much different order than the manga though (such
messages.messageBody:
Tiffany wrote:

>Yay!...I don't think PMK will ever be on Cartoon Network or anything...unless they edit out Maro and the OKita double entirely
>
>
The ADV site didn't have any release info for it that I saw. *pout* I do
know that the anime has things in much different order than the manga
though (such as Saitou & Yamanami's first appearances)

No Maro though since he was the anime writers' invention. AS the world's
only Maro fan I think he was a most interesting character and they could
have done a lot with him as a subplot, too bad they screwed it
up--really, really screwed it up in his last episode.

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
